titles: Poems by Hugh Crompton, the son of Bacchus, and god-son of Apollo being a fardle of fancies, or a medley of musick, stewed in four ounces of the oyl of epigrams.
author: Crompton, Hugh, fl. 1657.
publisher: Printed for E.C. for Tho. Alsop ...,
notes: Reproduction of original in British Library.
